name: Fusion (itch) (PattieZn)
description:
This is a word puzzle game. The player is a psychiatrist. He entered the memory of the patient Aurora, and by learning more about her, he helped her get out of the predicament better...

I used Unity, ink, Fungus, and made a switching system between Chinese and English (but because itch.io cannot display Chinese and did not release it, you can download the file containing (Chinese) in the compressed file)
